name: Heyburn Riverside Park
description: A scenic park along the Snake River with walking trails, picnic areas, and boat access. Perfect for outdoor recreation and family outings.

name: Snake River & Boat Launch
description: A great spot for fishing, kayaking, and boating. The river offers breathtaking views and a peaceful atmosphere for nature lovers.

name: Minidoka National Wildlife Refuge
description: A haven for bird watchers and wildlife enthusiasts, home to a variety of migratory birds, deer and other wildlife.

name: Storybook Park
description: A charming children's park with whimsical playground equipment, perfect for families with young kids.

name: Pomerelle Mountain Resort
description: A fantastic ski and snowboard resort just a short drive from Heyburn. Enjoy winter sports or summer mountain biking and hiking.

name: Cassia County Historical Museum
description: Discover the history of Cassia County with exhibits on pioneers, Native American culture, and early settlers.

name: Lake Walcott State Park
description: A beautiful state park with opportunities for fishing, boating, hiking, and camping, just a short drive from Heyburn.

name: Spudman Triathlon Route
description: A famous local triathlon event route where visitors can train, bike, swim, or run along the scenic Snake River course.
